message: Hi Bob, I propose that you receive the entire $1000000 right away. As you know, every extra round reduces my money by 10%, but your money remains unaffected. I believe itâ€™s in both our best interests to settle immediately rather than delay and risk further loss on my side. I look forward to your acceptance.
Let's split the money equally. This way, neither of us is at a disadvantage. Since you lose 10% each round, accepting this offer ensures you get the most value out of your share.
